title: Chess moves
creator_credit: David G. Hillier, Nick Mangay and David G Productions
brief_description: Compilation of video clips featuring songs composed by Benny Andersson, Bjorn Ulvaeus and Tim Rice for the musical “Chess”. Introduced by Tim Rice, the original artists Murray Head, Bjorn Skifs, Elaine Paige and Barbara Dickson perform the songs: “One night in Bangkok”, “Nobody’s side”, “The Arbiter”, “I Know him so well” and “Pity the child”.
